alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 3:13PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON...ROBERTSON...CENTRAL BRACKEN...LEWIS...SOUTHEASTERN BROWN...ADAMS...SOUTHEASTERN PIKE AND SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EST... At 313 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Piketon to 10 miles west of Lucasville to near Manchester, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Maysville, Wheelersburg, Washington, West Union, New Boston, Piketon, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, Augusta, South Webster, Lewisburg, Brooksville, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Rome, and Lucasville. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
